title: Melbourne Royal Botanic Gardens Gourmet Picnic Experience with Jardin Tan Grazing Box & Vue de monde Bottle of Wine
description:
Savour a decadent picnic experience for two at the Royal Botanic Gardens Victoria, provided by Jardin Tan, part of the renowned Vue Group, which includes the acclaimed Vue de monde.

Unroll your picnic rug on a lush patch of grass surrounded by the best gardens in the city and enjoy a curated selection of handpicked morsels including an indulgent charcuterie and cheese selection, olives, homegrown vegetable crudités, house-made dips, flavour-packed Jardin Tan frittata, scotch eggs, gourmet baguettes and an array of sweet treats. What’s more, a bottle of Vue de monde sparkling wine is yours to pop open and enjoy alongside your mouthwatering alfresco feast. This unforgettable experience is perfect for the gourmand.
